mapper.select: select p.pno, p.title, p.writer, to_char(p.write_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') as write_time, p.read_cnt, count(c.cno) as cnt from post p left join comments c on p.pno=c.pno group by p.pno, p.title, p.writer, p.write_time, p.read_cnt order by p.pno desc
